data.title: 25 Best movies of Jyothika
data.text:
A musician's love towards a stubborn deaf woman makes her eventually realize that there is more to her life than she previously thought.

College friends Jenny and Shiva part ways due to a misunderstanding. Although they are in love and realize they cannot live without each other, their egos prevent them from uniting.

Story of a rural Government school headmistress, who saves the school from its decline and reforms the same by handling the hindrances from private school owners, Govt. officials, politicians and even her colleagues.

Creepy happenings in an abandoned mansion are attributed to the ghost of an ancient courtesan, back for revenge.

It is a remake of the Critically acclaimed blockbuster Malayalam film Manichitrathazhu (1993)

It was the longest running South Indian film, with a theatrical run of 890 days, until its record was overtaken by the Telugu film Magadheera (2009) which completed a theatrical run of 1000 days. The film won five Tamil Nadu State Film Awards, four Film Fans' Association Awards and two Filmfare Awards. Including Best Actress award for Jyothika.

Mathew, a retired bank secretary, reluctantly enters politics for a by-election. The movie delves into their marriage dynamics, justice, and personal fulfillment amidst a tight-knit village community.

After a police team kills his brother, a drug-dealing gangster vows to kill the entire team and their respective families.

Arumugam lands in the city to protest to a minister about water pollution in his village. Here, he gets involved in a battle against corrupt politicians and rowdies, who leave him practically dead.

A Police Officer investigates a series of brutal rapes and murders, with the culprits seeming to cover more than one country.

A single mother changes her opinion about getting married again after meeting a single man and discovering that both of them have a similar past concerning their spouses.

An aspiring music director, trying to realize his dream for over eight years, sacrifices his love for his ambition, but faces a tricky situation when his brother's health deteriorates and his family is at risk financially.

A happily married man faces an emotional conflict, when his past lover comes back into his life.

Thirumalai, a mechanic, falls in love with Sweta. However, her father, the owner of a TV channel, is unhappy with their relationship. He takes Arasu help to create differences between the couple.

A police officer uncovers the truth about Kaathavarayan, a young man who is accused of assaulting his girlfriend.

Adityan and Ganga, who do not wish to marry for their respective reasons, try every trick to stop the wedding. All fails, but the wedding is cancelled for another reason. Then, they meet in the city.

A man arrives in Vizag and threatens to kill the top gangster in the city, due to a vendetta from his past.

Raghuram and Suriya are siblings. Being the youngest child in the family, Suriya is pampered by everyone. Feeling rejected and ignored, Raghuram decides to ruin Suriya's life.

Parvathy is elated when she finds out that her brother, Saravanan, who has been missing for 15 years, is in Goa. However, somebody has already hatched a plan to kill him.

Ponmagal Vandhal (Meaning: The Precious Princess has Arrived) is a courtroom drama that takes place in Ooty. Jyotika plays the lead in the film alongside various other veteran actors playing important roles.

The life of a housewife changes drastically after becoming a radio jockey in the city's biggest radio station.

Blind Srikanth gets into MIT, founds Bollant Industries. Pursues goals for visually impaired while facing entrepreneurial challenges, navigating personal sacrifices. Highlights obstacles overcome by the blind in academics and business.

A family's getaway turns terrifying when an intruder possesses the teen daughter's body, putting her at the mercy of his increasingly sinister commands.
